abstract: Eric Schmidt, Google’s chief executive, told analysts and reporters he hoped to work with Facebook, even though it had taken an investment from Microsoft.
snippet: Eric Schmidt, Google’s chief executive, told analysts and reporters he hoped to work with Facebook, even though it had taken an investment from Microsoft.
lead_paragraph: If the purpose of Google’s analyst day was to leave Wall Street analysts with an upbeat picture of the company’s prospects, no one was more bullish than Google’s chief executive, Eric E. Schmidt.

headline.main: Google Analyst Day (3): Staying Friends With Facebook

abstract: The investment ends two months of jockeying among Microsoft, Google and Yahoo for the right to invest in and forge close ties with the fast-growing social networking Web site.
snippet: The investment ends two months of jockeying among Microsoft, Google and Yahoo for the right to invest in and forge close ties with the fast-growing social networking Web site.
lead_paragraph: SAN FRANCISCO, Oct. 24  Microsoft has won a high-profile technology industry battle with Google and Yahoo to invest in the social networking upstart Facebook.

abstract: The latest version of the Google Earth features historic maps, information from National Geographic and Discovery Networks on geographical and historical sites around the world
snippet: The latest version of the Google Earth features historic maps, information from National Geographic and Discovery Networks on geographical and historical sites around the world
lead_paragraph: Sure, Google Earth (earth.google.com) for Windows, Mac OS X and Linux is an enjoyable way to take a satellite peek at your house, but the program’s Featured Content option adds several new layers of information to your desktop view of the world. Just click on Featured Content in the left pane of the Google Earth program window to see multimedia data overlaid with the program’s satellite images. The latest version of the program features historic maps, information from National Geographic and Discovery Networks on geographical and historical sites around the world and images of extreme environmental problems from the United Nations Environment Programme. Details are at earth.google.com/featured_content.html.

headline.main: Tip of the Week: Satellite Images

abstract: Microsoft prevailed in a high-profile technology industry battle with Google and Yahoo to invest in the social networking upstart.
snippet: Microsoft prevailed in a high-profile technology industry battle with Google and Yahoo to invest in the social networking upstart.
lead_paragraph: SAN FRANCISCO, Oct. 24 — Microsoft has won a high-profile technology industry battle with Google and Yahoo to invest in the social networking upstart Facebook.

headline.main: Microsoft to Pay $240 Million for Stake in Facebook

abstract: In taking Microsoft’s money to hire a battalion of engineers to take on parts of Google, Mark Zuckerberg is embracing the 1999 rallying cry: Go big or go home.
snippet: In taking Microsoft’s money to hire a battalion of engineers to take on parts of Google, Mark Zuckerberg is embracing the 1999 rallying cry: Go big or go home.
lead_paragraph: A week after I wrote that the current Internet bubble is different from the late 1990s because it is driven by defensive fear rather than boundless greed, the Facebook deal with Microsoft yesterday shows that there are still some who think they can make untold billions by changing the world.
